headline.main: Surgery to Restore Blood Flow to Brain After Strokes Reported to A. M. A.

docs.abstract: W L Laurence revs AMA conv symposium on med treatment and problems of aged
docs.lead_paragraph: Progress in clinical medicine was reported by 450 physicians in scientific papers, in symposia and in panel discussions at the annual meeting of the American Medical Association last week.
